name: Get Beak DEMO
description:
A savvy bird endures many misadventures while trying to liberate their fellow plebian birds from their mammalian captivity.

Get Beak is a 3D Platformer about jump management, strategic movement, throwing bombs, and freeing birds from cages.

This free playable DEMO includes four handcrafted levels with their own original songs, a tutorial level, some cinematics, a password-based cheating system, and configurable settings.

The demo was made in Godot in under two weeks.

If you have any lag or performance issues, try turning down render distance and chunk size in the graphics settings.
